title: Tapping TV icon
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps: When the user taps on the TV icon from the app header
custom_expected: Then the EPG view will launch

title: EPG View Title
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the TV icon from the app header
and is viewing the EPG view
custom_expected: Then the EPG view's title will be "Watch"

title: Segmented Control
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the EPG view
custom_expected:
Then there will be a segmented control below the title 
and the two options will be "MLB.TV" and "Featured"

title: Featured - Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an account that has SVOD entitlements (SUBSCRIBERVOD)
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "Featured" tab
and taps on a video from the "Featured" tab
custom_expected: Then the video content will playback successfully in full screen mode

title: Featured - Non-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user does not have entitlements for SVOD (SUBSCRIBERVOD)
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "Featured" tab
and taps on a video from the "Featured" tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV paywall

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - MLBALL
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an account that has TV entitlements (MLBALL)
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - MLBAUDIO
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an account that has only Audio entitlements (MLBAUDIO)
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - Single Team/MLBAUDIO
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an account that has both Single Team & Audio entitlements (MLBAUDIO)
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - Logged in/Free
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an account that has no entitlements
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - Not Logged in/Free
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is not logged in with an account, and has no entitlements
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - Anonymous IAP/MLBALL
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is not logged in with an account, but has TV entitlements via in-app purchase (MLBALL)
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: Watch Tab - Upsell - Anonymous IAP/MLBAUDIO
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is not logged in with an account, but has Audio entitlements via in-app purchase (MLBAUDIO)
custom_steps: When the user is on the Watch tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV upsell image

title: MLB.TV - Non-Entitled User - Live
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user does not have any entitlements
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and taps on a game tile with a red "LIVE" label
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV paywall

title: MLB.TV - Non-Entitled User - Archive
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user does not have any entitlements
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and taps on a game tile with a grey "ARCHIVE" label
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV paywall

title: MLB.TV - MLBAUDIO User - Live
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBAUDIO
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and taps on a game tile with a red "LIVE" label
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV paywall

title: MLB.TV - MLBAUDIO User - Archive
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBAUDIO
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and taps on a game tile with a grey "ARCHIVE" label
custom_expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV paywall

title: MLB.TV - MLBALL User - Live - Favorite/Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBALL
and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and their favorite team is playing, and is the home team 
and that game tile has a red "LIVE" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's TV feed will launch by default

custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBALL
and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and their favorite team is playing, and is the away team 
and that game tile has a red "LIVE" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's TV feed will launch by default

Given the MLB app is installed

and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and their favorite team is playing, and is the home team 
and that game tile has a grey "ARCHIVE" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's TV feed will launch by default

Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBALL
and has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and their favorite team is playing, and is the away team

and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's TV feed will launch by default

custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBALL
and doesn't have a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and a game tile has a red "LIVE" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the home team's TV feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - MLBALL User - Archive - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled with MLBALL
and doesn't have a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and a game tile has a grey "ARCHIVE" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the home team's TV feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Free User - Live - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a Free account
and doesn't have a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and a game tile has a red "LIVE" label and a "Free Game of the Day" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the home team's TV feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Free User - Archive - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a Free account
and doesn't have a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG view
and selects the "MLB.TV" tab
and a game tile has a grey "ARCHIVE" label and a "Free Game of the Day" label
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the home team's TV feed will launch by default

title: Refresh - Current Date
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG for the current date
and sits on the view
custom_expected: Then the view will refresh every 30 seconds

title: Refresh - Future Date
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG for a future date
and sits on the view
custom_expected: Then the view will refresh every 5 minutes

title: Time Zone - Automation Candidate
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is in a time zone outside of the Eastern Time Zone
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there are games scheduled
custom_expected: Then the game times will be displayed in the user's time zone

title: Layout - More than One Game Scheduled
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is more than one game scheduled on a given day
custom_expected:
Then the game tiles will display as a two column game tile layout 
with an even distribution of games on each column

title: Layout - One Game Scheduled
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is only one game scheduled on a given day
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display alone in the left column

title: Layout - No Games Scheduled
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there are no games scheduled on a given day
custom_expected: Then the view will display "No Scheduled Games" in white text in the middle of the page

title: All Star Game
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and is viewing the date with the All Star Game scheduled
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will display alone in the left column
and the team logos and names will appear correctly

title: No Hitter - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both live and a no hitter
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

a red LIVE label in the top right corner of the game tile
a blue label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "No Hitter"

title: No Hitter - Final
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both final and a no hitter
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

grey text in the top left corner of the game tile saying, "FINAL"
a blue label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "No Hitter"

title: Perfect Game - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both live and a perfect game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

a red LIVE label in the top right corner of the game tile
a blue label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "Perfect Game"

title: Perfect Game - Final
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both final and a perfect game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

grey text in the top left corner of the game tile saying, "FINAL"
a blue label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "Perfect Game"

title: Free Game of the Day - Preview
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both in Preview and a Free Game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

the game time in grey text in the top right corner of the game tile
a white label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "Free Game of the Day"

title: Free Game of the Day - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both live and a Free Game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

a red LIVE label in the top right corner of the game tile
a white label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "Free Game of the Day"

title: Free Game of the Day - Final
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both final and a Free Game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

grey text in the top right corner of the game tile saying, "FINAL"
a white label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "Free Game of the Day"

title: YouTube Game - Preview
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both in Preview and a YouTube Game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

the game time in grey text in the top right corner of the game tile
a red label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "YouTube"

title: YouTube Game - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is both live and a YouTube Game
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following:

a red LIVE label in the top right corner of the game tile
a red label in the center of the bottom of the game tile saying, "YouTube"

title: YouTube Game - Final
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a YouTube Game that is now final and with an archive available
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will include a grey ARCHIVE label in the top right corner of the game tile
and will NOT have any sort of YouTube label

title: Game with Live Feed(s) - No Blackout
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game with Live feeds that the user is NOT blacked out of
custom_expected: Then the game tile will contain a red LIVE label in the top right corner

title: Game with Live Feed(s) - Local Blackout w/ Audio
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game with Live feeds that the user IS blacked out of locally
custom_expected:
Then in the top right corner of the game tile there will be:

a grey TV icon with a slash through
a yellow headphones icon

title: Game with Live Feed(s) - National Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a non-executive account
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game with Live feeds that the user IS blacked out of nationally
and the user taps on the game tile
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with a message that they are blacked out of this game

title: Game in Final - Archive Feeds
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game with Archive feed(s) available
custom_expected: Then the game tile will contain a grey ARCHIVE label in the top right corner

title: Game in Preview
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in preview
custom_expected: Then the game time will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Preview - Split Doubleheader
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a split double header scheduled
and the games are in preview

"doubleHeader": "S"
custom_expected: Then both game tiles will display their own game time

title: Game in Preview - Back to Back Doubleheader
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a back to back double header scheduled
and the games are in preview

"doubleHeader": "Y"
custom_expected:
Then Game 1's tile will display a game time
and Game 2's tile will display "Game 2" in grey text in the top left corner

title: Game in Preview - Start time TBD
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in preview
and there is no scheduled start time
custom_expected: Then "TBD" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Preview - Delayed
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in preview that is currently delayed
custom_expected: Then the word "DELAY" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Progress
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress
custom_expected: Then the inning status will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Progress - Warmup
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress, that is in Warmup
custom_expected: Then "WARMUP" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Progress - Top Inning
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress, that is in the top of an inning
custom_expected: Then "TOP X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the inning number

title: Game in Progress - Mid Inning
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress, that is in the middle of an inning
custom_expected: Then "MID X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the inning number

title: Game in Progress - Bot Inning
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress, that is in the bottom of an inning
custom_expected: Then "BOT X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the inning number

title: Game in Progress - End Inning
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress, that is at the end of an inning
custom_expected: Then "END X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the inning number

title: Game in Progress - Delayed
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress that is currently delayed
custom_expected: Then the word "DELAY" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Final
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
custom_expected: Then the word "FINAL" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Final - Completed Early
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
that ended in less than 9 innings
custom_expected: Then "FINAL/X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the number of innings played

title: Game in Final - Forfeit
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
and the game has been forefit
custom_expected: Then the word "FOREFIT" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Final - Cancelled
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
and the game has been cancelled
custom_expected: Then the word "CANCELLED" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Final - Postponed
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
and the game has been postponed
custom_expected: Then the word "POSTPONED" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile

title: Game in Final - Extra Innings
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
that ended in more than 9 innings
custom_expected: Then "FINAL/X" will be in grey text in the top left corner of the game tile, where X is the number of innings played

title: Team Info
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there are games scheduled on a given day
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will display the following:

away team logo, away team name (i.e. "Mariners") above the 
home team logo, home team name (i.e. "Padres")

title: Game in Preview - Scores
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in preview
custom_expected: Then the game tile will not display any score numbers

title: Game in Progress - Scores
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display a score number to the right of each team name

title: Game in Final - Scores
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in final
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display a score number to the right of each team name

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in progress
and the user has set `Hide Scores` on in Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display the team logo, team name, but the scores will not display for live or final games.

title: Hide Scores - Extra Innings -- Automation Candidate
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in Final that finished in Extra Innings
and the user has set `Hide Scores` on in Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display the "Final" text, but will not include the inning number

title: Hide Scores - Completed Early -- Automation Candidate
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game in Final that finished in less than 9 Innings
and the user has set `Hide Scores` on in Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the game tile will display the "Final" text, but will not include the inning number

title: Hide Scores - No-hitter/Perfect Game labels -- Automation Candidate
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game that is either a No-hitter or Perfect Game
and the user has set `Hide Scores` on in Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the game tile will not display the "No-hitter" or "Perfect Game" label

title: Split Squad - Away Team
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where only the away team is split squad
custom_expected: Then the away team logo in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Split Squad - Home Team
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where only the home team is split squad
custom_expected: Then the home team logo in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Split Squad - Both Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where the both teams are split squad
custom_expected: Then both team logos in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Followed Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a followed team set
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the followed team is playing on a given day
custom_expected: Then the followed team's game tile will contain an outlined gray star next to the followed team's name

title: Followed Team (Home) - Default Feed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a followed team set
and the followed team is playing on a given day
and the followed team is the home team
and the game has live or archive feeds available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the user taps the followed team's game tile

(make sure followed team is not playing the user's favorite team or a followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the followed team's feed will launch by default

title: Followed Team (Away) - Default Feed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a followed team set
and the followed team is playing on a given day
and the followed team is the away team
and the game has live or archive feeds available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the user taps the followed team's game tile

(make sure followed team is not playing the user's favorite team or a followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the followed team's feed will launch by default

title: Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's game tile will always be sorted to the top of the game list, and a yellow star will be next to the favorite team's name

title: Favorite Team (Home) - Default Feed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a favorite team set
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
and the favorite team is the home team
and the game has live or archive feeds available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the user taps the favorite team's game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a favorite team set
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
and the favorite team is the away team
and the game has live or archive feeds available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the user taps the favorite team's game tile
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: Split Squad - Away Team
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where only the away team is split squad
custom_expected: Then the away team logo in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Split Squad - Home Team
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where only the home team is split squad
custom_expected: Then the home team logo in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Split Squad - Both Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the EPG > MLB.TV view
and there is a game scheduled where the both teams are split squad
custom_expected: Then both team logos in the game tile will include a "SS" graphic

title: Favorite Team - Sorting
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
and the user has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's game will be sorted to the top of the list

title: Followed Team - Sorting
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user has a followed team set
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the followed team is playing on a given day
custom_expected: Then the followed team's game will be sorted right after the user's favorite team's game, unless the followed team's game is live and the favorited team's game is not.

title: Sorting - Free Game - Blackout
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and there is a Free Game scheduled
and the Free Game is either locally or nationally blacked out
custom_expected: Then the Free Game will still be sorted to the top of the game list

title: Sorting - Free Game - Favorite Team
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the user is a lite user
and there is a Free Game scheduled
and the user's favorite team also has a game scheduled 

(two separate games)
custom_expected:
Then the Free Game will still be sorted to the top of the game list
and will be listed before the favorite team's game

title: Sorting - Favorite Team - Local Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled
and the user has a favorite team set
and the user is located in the favorite team's blackout region

(i.e. fav team is Mets, user lives in NY)
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
custom_expected:
Then the favorite team's game tile will always be sorted to the top of the game list
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: Sorting - Favorite Team - National Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is entitled
and the user has a favorite team set
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and the favorite team is playing on a given day
and that game is nationally blacked out
custom_expected:
Then the favorite team's game tile will always be sorted to the top of the game list
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: Sorting - Local Blackout - Pregame
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and a local team is playing on a given day
and the game is in pregame state
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will be sorted in chronological order
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: Sorting - Local Blackout - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and a local team is playing on a given day
and the game is in progress

("abstractGameCode": "L")
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will be sorted to the bottom of the game list
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: Sorting - National Blackout - Pregame
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and there is a nationally blacked out game on a given day
and the game is in pregame state

(i.e. Sunday night ESPN game, Saturday afternoon FOX game)
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will be sorted in chronological order
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: Sorting - National Blackout - Live
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user launches the EPG > MLB.TV tab
and there is a nationally blacked out game on a given day
and the game is in progress
("abstractGameCode": "L")

(i.e. Sunday night ESPN game, Saturday afternoon FOX game)
custom_expected:
Then the game tile will be sorted to the bottom of the game list
and will be marked with a grey blackout icon in the top right of the game tile

title: User taps on the Date Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND the user is on the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the date in the top of the MLB.TV tab
custom_expected: THEN the Calendar Picker appears

title: Number of games on Calendar matches number of games in EPG
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Date at the top of the MLB.TV tab
and is viewing the calendar picker
custom_expected: THEN the number of games listed on each date in the calendar should match the number of games scheduled for that date

title: User taps on a date in the Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a date on the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be taken back to the MLB.TV tab
AND the date that the user is left on should be the newly selected date

title: User taps on the 'Today' button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
AND the user is viewing a date that is different than today's date
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Date in the top of the MLB.TV tab
AND the user taps the 'Today' button in the top of the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be brought to the MLB.TV tab
AND the date the user is on should be 'Todays' date

title: User taps on the forward and back arrows in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
And has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the left or right calendar arrows
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should adjust and show the newly selected month accordingly

title: User swipes left and right in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
AND has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes left and right on the calendar
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should flip to show the newly selected month

title: User taps month from the month bar at the bottom of Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the EPG view > MLB.TV tab
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a month from the bottom month bar
custom_expected:
THEN the month tapped should show as selected in the bottom bar
and the month selected should be reflected in the calendar
